title: Client Store Upgrade!!
body:
Got an idea guys, in the champ and skins section make a another category so you can only see 520skins or 1350skins or 975 skin etc. Same with champs so it makes it a lot easier to look through all said skins for that price would make a great addition to the league store.

Thoughts bellow.

replies.body: Scrolling is hard, make it so monkeys can shop...
exactly lmao nah I just want to look at one set of skins not all at all times
You can already sort the store by RP/BE price and from low>high or high>low.
yes you can but you cannot sort so you can ONLY see 520 or 1350 skins
That's true but given you can just scroll down and see them all in their own chunk I don't think it's something that would really be all that useful.
